rows.label: tlk70000022_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Reckon we've finally nailed down
locations for the next shelters.

rows.label: tlk70000022_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Now we just need to raise the
funds for them. Morumo should have
it well in hand, or so I hear.

rows.label: tlk70000022_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I've always held that merchants think
of nowt but profit, but I suppose
that may have been a bit harsh.

rows.label: tlk70000022_04_msg0004
rows.name:
This job is bringing out a different
side in all of us. Me included.

rows.label: tlk70000022_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Knighting ceremony? Yes, I may have
heard one or two people mention
that. It's nowt that concerns me.
